inputs.name: pathToVersionJson
inputs.label: Path to version.json
inputs.helpMarkDown: The path to the version.json, which should contain the following properties: _'version': string_ (e.g. '1.3.0'), _'releaseBranches': string[]_ (the branch names that will be used for release versions).

inputs.name: updateNuspecFiles
inputs.label: Update Nuspec files
inputs.helpMarkDown: If set to _true_, the version will also be inserted/updated in `.nuspec` files

inputs.name: updateBuildNumber
inputs.label: Set build number
inputs.helpMarkDown: If set to _true_, the build number is set to the computed version

inputs.name: addCiLabel
inputs.label: Add CI label to PR builds if no postfix is set
inputs.helpMarkDown: If set to _true_, the postfix label 'ci' will be set for PR builds if no other label is set. For example, creating a PR build with the specified version `1.0.0` will result in `1.0.0-ci.20045.123`. When the label is already set, e.g. to `1.0.0-rc1`, it will be respected and results in `1.0.0-rc1.20045.123`
